content: Ebon Flow is one of the Transformation Spells you can find in Black Myth: Wukong. Focused on dodging and deflecting attacks to then follow those actions up with powerful attacks, Ebon Flow can easily be missed within The New West as it is a part of a long quest chain.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Ebon_Flow.md', within the main section titled 'Ebon Flow'.
The content is as follows:
Ebon Flow is one of the Transformation Spells you can find in Black Myth: Wukong. Focused on dodging and deflecting attacks to then follow those actions up with powerful attacks, Ebon Flow can easily be missed within The New West as it is a part of a long quest chain.
